text:
Awesome episode :clap:
Enjoyed it a lot, there are useful info and lots of laugh. Great! Looking forward to more of your episodes

Good Episode, We are new to HubSpot and are currently building our second Enterprise CMS site, our clients love the look of the email offering from Marketing Hub but the Pricing is so high when compared to something like mailchimp
Really excited about upcoming features for drag and drop email editor. Where can I learn more about the undocumented feature Sarah mentioned? I’d be super interested to try it out.
I’d appreciate that over the errors about style tags in the email body. :sweat_smile:
